name: Target from a plane/frame
description: Create a fully constrained pose target for the robot's end-effector using a GH Plane or compas Frame.

inputParameters.name: plane
inputParameters.description: The Rhino plane or COMPAS frame from which we create position and orientation constraints.

inputParameters.name: target_mode
inputParameters.description: The target mode. String of 'ROBOT', 'TOOL', or 'WORKPIECE'.

inputParameters.name: tolerance_position
inputParameters.description: The allowed tolerance to the frame's position (defined in the robot's units). Defaults to 0.001

inputParameters.name: tolerance_xaxis
inputParameters.description: The allowed tolerance of the frame's X-axis in degrees.

inputParameters.name: tolerance_yaxis
inputParameters.description: The allowed tolerance of the frame's Y-axis in degrees.

inputParameters.name: tolerance_zaxis
inputParameters.description: The allowed tolerance of the frame's Z-axis in degrees.

inputParameters.name: tool_coordinate_frame
inputParameters.description: The tool tip coordinate frame relative to the flange coordinate frame of the robot. If not specified, the target point is relative to the robot's flange (T0CF). Accepts Rhino / Grasshopper Frame or COMPAS Frame.
